subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Marty Schottenheimer will return as coach of the San Diego Chargers next season, but he turned down a one-year extension for 2008 worth $4.5 million.
snippet: Marty Schottenheimer will return as coach of the San Diego Chargers next season, but he turned down a one-year extension for 2008 worth $4.5 million.
